title: May and Pepper's Kids
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LtPQ6p

by WhimsicalEthnographies

“You know, we do have extra floors at the tower,” Pepper is only partly joking.

“Let’s not get crazy,” May snorts. “And he may not realize it now, but I’ll give it another week or two until he’s ready for a break. Teenagers are A LOT.”

“Don’t tell him that. He’ll probably be horribly offended someone is talking about Peter that way.”

“No, I’m gonna let him figure that one out on his own. Preferably when I’m relaxing at a spa somewhere far far away.”

“We’ll make a date, then. Tell you what,” Pepper sits up. “I’ll go get our children and get them to actually be productive, while you and I will not indulge in maladaptive stress relief and actually take a breath tonight.”

Words: 3748, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Up Came the Sun

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Pepper Potts, May Parker (Spider-Man), Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Pepper Potts
  • Additional Tags: Pepper Potts Is a Good Bro, Awesome Pepper Potts, Awesome May Parker (Spider-Man), May is a rockstar, IronDad and SpiderSon, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, but let’s be real Tony is still a big kid, and he loves when he doesn’t have to be the grown-up


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LtPQ6p

blog.name: severly-enchanting-colours
blog.title: If You Aren’t A Tony Stark Stan Stay Away
blog.description: she/her • I do marvel rp! Message if interested! • I have a huge crush on Peter Parker this is an issue • This blog is mostly marvel, if you only want marvel block the ‘not marvel’ or the ‘scarlett rambles’ tag• If you don’t want the rp, block the ‘rp’ tag•

tags: but i hope you like it
body:
Soulmates

(A/N: Hey guys! This is just a soulmate AU, basically, when you first set eyes on your soulmate, you get a tattoo on your wrist that says what they first thought of you when they saw you. Does that make sense? You’ll get it eventually, anyways, enjoy :D)

<•~~•>

Tony Stark walked into his nearest coffee shop, yes he had his own premium coffee machine at home, but he just wanted too get out of the house. He was having trouble concentrating and Peter not being around made the tower so quiet and boring.

he walked in and ordered.

“Just an americano, thanks” the billionaire said as he placed his order, he saw the server look up in shock at them realising who he was, just slowly nodding whilst still writing down the order and then ran off too the back, possibly to go and tell everyone ‘Iron Man was it their coffee shop!’

He laughed at the image of it and then went and sat at a table near a window.

Meanwhile, Stephan Strange, a sorcerer, was walking down the road in his robes and cloak and all, tired and exhausted from teaching students at Kamar-Taj all day, he just wanted a coffee.

Walking by a window that belonged too his favourite coffee shop, he looked inside and saw a stunning man, studying his face, he could see just from his profile that he was real eye candy, he had a similar beard, brown eyes, brown hair and a small nose. The only words that came to Stranges’ mind: “fucking beautiful.”

A gasp escaped the shorter males mouth after a long gulp of coffee, he felt a sharp stabbing pain on his wrist and looked down immediately. He blinked in disbelief, mouth agape, reading the same words again and again: “fucking beautiful.”

Tony turned around wildly, setting his cup down on the table, looking around the small building, trying to find someone looking at him. Finally, he looked out the window behind him and saw a taller and attractive looking man looking at him, head slightly tilted, almost as if he was studying him; that sounds creepy, but the richer of the two just found it romantic (but him being his soulmate probably helped)

“Well.” Thought Tony: “if he is my soulmate, I’m lucky as hell.”

It was at that moment he realised he maybe just etched those words permanently on the handsome man ahead of him. “Shit.” He said aloud

“Shit, oh my god, he probably thinks I’m so cheesy, oh my god what do I do?!” He thought, probably looking and sounding like an anxious teen.

That was when the sorcerer felt the same stabbing the other had on his wrist, looking down, handling the pain slightly worse due too his multiple surgeries on his hands, and seeing the words. “If he’s my soulmate, I’m lucky as hell.” He stared at the words for a second and then looked at the other, seeing him looking at him too, biting his lip in worry.

Stephen smiled slightly, took a deep breath and walked in, ready too meet his lifelong partner.

<•~~•>

A/N: So guys, I hope you liked that! I have loads of other soulmate ideas which I plan too use (that I found on this website) so please tell me if you like this so I know too write more! Anyway, bye.

title: Assembling the Heroes
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MTYqA5

by FangedBast (MD2811)

The aftermath of the Fall of S.H.I.E.L.D. brought Clint Barton’s family out to the open and gradually more and more of the characters (both those already established in the MCU and those who haven’t been yet) start moving in essentially building a big family which sometimes fights crime and sometimes help Tony Stark spend his fortune on good cause.

Words: 1970, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Living a Life of a Hero

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Marvel (Comics), Iron Man (Movies), Iron Man (Comics), Captain America (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types, Captain America (Comics), Winter Soldier (Comics), Hawkeye (Comics), Black Widow (Comics), The Incredible Hulk (2008), The Incredible Hulk (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, Gen, M/M
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Laura Barton


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MTYqA5

blog.name: xthenastark
blog.title: tired™
blog.description: I just really love Tony Stark

summary:
Tony, holding a piece of paper with "Tony" written down: can you say this out loud?
Peter: sure. It says "Mr. Stark"
Tony, with...
body:
Tony, holding a piece of paper with “Tony” written down: can you say this out loud?

Peter: sure. It says “Mr. Stark”

Tony, with another paper that says “Stephen”: and can you read this out loud?

Peter: mr. doctor

Tony, now holding a paper that says “Steve”: and this?

Peter: uhh no

Tony: ???

Peter: no

Tony: but-

Peter: no

Tony: but-

Peter: no

Peter: no
trail.content:
Tony, holding a piece of paper with “Tony” written down: can you say this out loud?

Peter: sure. It says “Mr. Stark”

Tony, with another paper that says “Stephen”: and can you read this out loud?

Peter: mr. doctor

Tony, now holding a paper that says “Steve”: and this?

Peter: uhh no

Tony: ???

Peter: no

Tony: but-

Peter: no

blog.name: hollandfangirl
blog.title: Sophia Salvatore
blog.description: Hi everyone, my name's Sophia and I'm 18. As you can probably tell, I am obsessed with Tom Holland and everything that he does. I am also a huge fan of Cillian Murphy as he's my favourite actor and, let's face it, pretty much perfect. I'm a fan of Marvel, Musical Theatre, reading etc...Requests are open.

title: Talk English!
body:
Request - I was wondering if you could write a Peter x reader recently went to visit her family in Poland and when she comes back, at random times, she switches back to speaking Polish.

Requested by - @maroongoon

‘(Y/N)!’ I looked around to see my boyfriend, Peter Parker running towards me.

I had been in Poland for the past week, visiting some of family and even though I was sad to leave again, I couldn’t wait to get home to my boyfriend and the avengers who had welcomed me with open arms.

When Peter reached me, he hugged me and spun me around before kissing me, making up for the week we had spent apart before he put his arm around my shoulders as we walked to the car.

‘So, how was Poland?’

‘It was great! It was so good to see my family again!’

I yawned and felt all of my energy drain away as I leaned against Peter, my eyes drifting closed. I heard him chuckle at my state and I felt him kiss my forehead.

‘I love you.’

…

I woke up in mine and Peter’s shared bed and I realised that Peter must have carried me here.

I went downstairs to see Peter, Tony and Steve all talking in the living room. When they saw me in the doorway, they all turned to face me.

‘Welcome back!’

I grinned at them all before replying, ‘Dzieki chlopaki!’ Thanks guys!

Peter and Steve grinned back at me whilst Tony’s face dropped and he sighed.

I walked over to Peter and he wrapped an arm around my waist.

‘What’s wrong with him,’ I asked, pointing at Tony.

Tony turned to me, ‘Talk. English,’ he shouted, causing Peter and Steve to laugh at him.

I looked at Peter, ‘I did it again, didn’t I?’

Peter laughed and tucked my hair behind my ear, ‘you did it again.’

I hid my face in Peter’s shoulder as Steve spoke.

‘Don’t worry about it (Y/N), Tony’s just annoyed that he can’t understand what you’re saying.’

I groaned, knowing what Tony could be like, before running after him.

‘Tony, I’m sorry! I’ll stop slipping into Polish! I’M SORRY!!!’

title: Stay Awake (With Me)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Nl6x5N

by That_One_Hufflepuff

After Ultron, all of the Avengers had nightmares.

Wanda’s were particularly bad.

In other words, a series of short little stories of Wanda and Vision getting to know each other… in the middle of the night. Lots and lots and lots of fluff coming soon! Enjoy!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: delicate
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PD8fRA

by light_loves_the_dark

Natasha slings Tony’s arm around her shoulder and helps him to his feet. Then, she reaches for the shield. There is a long, ugly scratch through the star in the middle, and Tony vacillates between being horrified and smug.

“Leave it,” he argues, looking away as if the sight might cause him to collapse again.

“No,” she says, strapping it to her arm. He has seen that look on her face before, in a crowded lab on a Helicarrier, in the compound after Rhodey fell from the sky. He knows there is no arguing with her, and he is too weak to argue with fists anymore.

Natasha leaves that bunker with the knowledge that everything she is holding in her arms is what’s left of the Avengers.

-

Natasha was the one to get Tony out of Siberia. Something so small leads to something very big.

Words: 3344, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

also.. he still loves his team and misses them so much

but in case they don't return? he will fill their shoes himself
summary:
Tony has always defended himself through evasive 
manoeuvres, and never used shields.
Yet in Infinity War, he is using shields...
caption:
Tony has always defended himself through evasive manoeuvres, and never used shields. Yet in Infinity War, he is using shields left and right. (The only time he shielded himself was in Iron Man 1, when he opened flaps in his gauntlet, and that was because he down low on power and couldn’t fly away.)

Tony realised that the team has lost a “shield”, so he took it upon himself to become one. He built a shield that could withstand the power of an Infinity Stone. Because he always knew the fight was coming, a bigger threat is on the horizon and he needed to be ready.

Meanwhile, Tony designed new shield for Cap (despite all the Civil War mess), new “magic” belt for Thor (despite not knowing whether Thor will return), ensured Hulkbuster was accessible to Bruce (despite Bruce being MIA) and built space-travel-safe spider-themed nano-suits for Peter (despite Peter not being an avenger yet).
